div.p: No thanks. I want something perfectly stable and squeeze is very good for that.
for more recent versions of mplayer and ffmpeg which display webm contents. too old on squeeze
more than a million torrent files from the Internet Archive online http://ur1.ca/9xhzf
!php shell detector http://ur1.ca/9xhjr
#santoku #mobileforensics http://ur1.ca/9xef0
nmap -n -sP 192.168.10.0/24 # know all IP addresses of alive hosts on the LAN
canto left for newsbeuter
debian-multimedia changes its domain name into deb-multimedia. !debian users, update your apt sources.list
debian-multimedia changes its domain name into deb-multimedia
add EXIF timestamps to photos http://ur1.ca/9uua9 !cli
the statusnet API is not complete and the Twitter API is difficult to find and read on twitter site
source parameter changed
awk script to play random tones http://ur1.ca/9ul5z
!cli #awk filters http://ur1.ca/9ul5c
Oops, sorry, it's always a problem for me to paste links http://www.acc.umu.se/~saasha/filters/
evilvte 0.5.2 adds the #solarized color style option. pre-release out now
#smxi script for !debian http://smxi.org useful !cli tool
#surf the #suckless browser has a new release (0.5) out !
!cli #awk filters http://ur1.ca/9u6x7 entities to txt awk
#awk filters http://s.s/qc_redir?q=html entities to txt awk
